title: Overworld Angel

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Pick 2 players. If they win together, add them to your soul. If they're both town, add only one.
-Pick a player and guess their faction. If you're correct, add them to your soul.
-[Counter Charge-2] When using this ability, you may pay the cost. If you do, redirect everyone in your soul to you.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Come back to the heavens (die during the night.)

desc:
Post 1400
*Woops guys sorry accidentally slipped off the staircase to Heaven.*
